    • Constructor Detail

      • QuestProcessor

        public QuestProcessor(java.lang.String tempFolder,
                      java.lang.String featuresFile,
                      java.lang.String gizaFile,
                      java.lang.String sourceNGram,
                      java.lang.String sourceCorpus,
                      java.lang.String targetCorpus,
                      java.lang.String modelPath,
                      java.lang.String sourceLanguage,
                      java.lang.String targetLanguage)
        Creates a QuEstProcessor instance.
        Parameters:
        tempFolder - Folder in which to save temporary files.
        featuresFile - XML file with the features to be calculated.
        gizaFile - Translation probabilities file.
        sourceNGram - N-gram counts file.
        sourceCorpus - Source language corpus.
        targetCorpus - Target language corpus.
        modelPath - Path in which to save the trained model.
        sourceLanguage - Source language.
        targetLanguage - Target language.

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> calculateFeatures(java.lang.String sourceFile,
                                                                                    java.lang.String targetFile)
        Calculates feature values for all sentence pairs in a set of files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - Source language sentences file.
        targetFile - Target language sentences file.
        Returns:
        A matrix with the feature values of all sentence pairs.

      • calculateFeaturesForPair

        Calculates feature values for an individual pair of sentences.
        Parameters:
        sourceSentence - Source language sentence.
        targetSentence - Target language sentence.
        Returns:
        A matrix with the feature values of the sentence pair.

      • estimateQuality

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> estimateQuality(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> features)
        Estimates the quality of a translation.
        Parameters:
        features - Matrix with the features of the translations to be scored.
        Returns:
        An integer array with the scores predicted.
